panels.title: About
panels.text:
This dashboard displays metric data for telegraf agens using the [http_response plugin](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/http_response).

environment, location and service as custom tags that must be added in your telegraf conf file. For an example implementation see: https://github.com/rjury-sumo/sumo-telegraf-examples/tree/main/docker#http_response-componenthttp_response

panels.title: About
panels.text:
This dashboard displays metric data for telegraf agens using the [http_response plugin](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/http_response).

environment, location and service as custom tags that must be added in your telegraf conf file. For an example implementation see: https://github.com/rjury-sumo/sumo-telegraf-examples/tree/main/docker#http_response-componenthttp_response

queries.queryString:
component=http_response metric=http_response_response_time  result="success"
service={{service}} environment={{environment}} server={{url}} location={{location}}
| topk(10,max) by server,environment,location,service,method
| max by server,environment,location,service,method
